messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Moving to the basement, 131 Front Street between Main and North.
Is there anyone injured?
Unsure at this time if anyone is injured.
Shots are coming from the second floor. A suspect is still in the building.
It's responding. Stand by and we need backup.
Can you confirm your current location again?
131 Front Street. Possible shooting.
Do you have any information on the assailant?
Not confirmed. They may be in the basement or the main floor. There is no second story.
Understood. We're sending officers to the rear of the building. Do you have a description of the suspect?
Not clearly. There are reports of two victims and multiple people barricaded in the basement.
Alright, we are mobilizing SWAT. Stay put.
Noted. We'll stay in position. Do you need us to do anything?
Yes, make sure all available units head to 131 Front Street and stage at Oak and Main.
10-4. We'll set a perimeter and wait for equipment.
Notify EMS to stage at Main and Oak Street.
Confirmed. EMS has been notified.
We're coordinating with headquarters for additional support.
10-4. Proceeding with caution. Suspect may still be armed.
Received. We'll also stage tow trucks to clear any blocking vehicles.
10-4. Will ensure all personnel are advised to use cover.
The back door appears to be breached. Suspect may have shot themselves.
Understood. But still proceed with caution.
We need the building's layout. Contact building management.
Understood. Will do.
Confirm if any victims are still inside.
Attempting to contact someone with details.
Keep them calm and secure. Lock or barricade doors if possible.
No locks on the doors. They are using furniture to barricade.
Stay put. Help is on the way.
10-25. Will relay information from inside.
We're sending more units to secure the perimeter.
Affirmative. Suspect's vehicle is blocking the back door.
Hold position. SWAT is en route.
10-4. Will maintain current position.
We're closing all roads near Main and Front Street.
Understood. Coordinating with traffic control.
Alert, suspect may still be in the basement. Proceed with extreme caution.
Roger that. EMS is staging and waiting for clearance.
Keep updating us with any new information from inside the building.
All right. If you have contact with people inside, ensure they know to stay put.
Victims are being extracted and transported to hospitals.
Received. We'll keep monitoring from our end.
All available personnel should report to the staging area.
Understood. We'll keep eyes on any movement inside.
Any officers at security cameras location, report back.
Copy that. Looking into security footage now.
Advise all emergency personnel of current status. Building is not yet secure.
10-4. Circulating to all units.
